post:
​

 
VPSDATABASE is a newly formed company, with the purpose of supplying reliable hosting and virtual servers, at a reduced, cheap rate to consumers.
All our virtual private servers are run on Premium hardware servers. We offer an environment that promises high availability, and extreme scalability. Both of these give you more uptime, and better speeds, which will bring your site more visibility. The VPS works great for new sites, growing sites and existing sites!
 
We provide quality support to all of our clients. We can be reached over emails, support tickets and live chat available on our website. 
 
We also have a 7 day money back guarantee if you are not completely happy with our service. To read more about the refund policy please go here. REFUND POLICY
 
==================================================

Frequently asked questions:
 
1. Do you offer demo accounts?
Unfortunately no. We suggest you to signup for our service and if you feel uncomfortable place refund request within 7 days.
 
2. What is your stand on DMCA/Abuse policy?
The DMCA will be forwarded to you to handle within 24 hours. How ever this is not applicable to certain cases like email spam, dos/ddos, hosting child porn etc and it will be handled according to the severity of the case.
 
3. Do you offer any money back guarantee?
Yes, we do offer 7 days money back guarantee.
 
4. What type of payments do you accept?
PayPal, Payza, Liberty Reserve
 
5. Adult content is allowed?
Yes, we accept lawful adult content
 
6. Do you accept VPN services?
Yes, we allow it with PPTP, and OpenVPN.
 
7. Installation Time?
Instant activation, once paid, you will receive the root access in your email.
 
8. What is the speed of the servers?
You can open up a ticket and we are glad to show you.
 
9. Do you offer custom plans?
Yes, we do offer custom plans. If you are looking for a custom plan feel free to contact our sales department.
 
10. I cannot find that information on your website.
If you cannot find something you are looking for feel free to contact us via ticket or e-mail.
